title: A PATT-linked grant to support Exeter's observational astrophysics research
abstractText: The funds awarded will be used to pay for travel and subsistence costs associated with observing runs on telescopes around the world.
impactText:
By academics through publication in academic journals
For education and outreach e.g. via the Exeter Astrophysics website, the JCMT website, and in group outreach activities such as schools talks. Education Cultural,Societal
findingsText: Astronomy data collected for various research projects related to star and planet formation. Most of these data are still in analysis and will be published at a later date. Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Creative Economy,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections
